title: Let's Work Together
subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to discuss opportunities? I'd love to hear from you.
description: Drop me a message and let's start a conversation!
formDescription: Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your project or just say hello...

toast.successDescription: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you soon.
toast.errorDescription: Please try again or contact me directly via email.
